Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading post and does not provide any evidence or factual information to support the statement.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo shows opposition party members attending a rally in 2017, not mourning the 2019 election results.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the opposition party members wearing black in the photo are mourning the election results, without any evidence or context to support this assumption.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photo by falsely attributing it to the 2019 election results, when it is actually from a different event.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting misleading information and failing to provide accurate context or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no evidence of alternative explanations being presented in the claim.
